data_description.mode: Choose to filter by administrative district or by a coordinate + radius.
data_description.location: Pick a position on the map. Defaults to your Home Assistant home location.
data_description.radius_km: Defaults to 10 km. Alerts are matched if their area passes within this radius.
data_description.exclude_sea: Exclude marine warnings (e.g., sea level, wind at sea).
data_description.include_messages: The integration always shows warnings. Enable this option to also show messages, which can, for example, be a risk.
data_description.include_geometry: Attach GeoJSON geometry for each warning area to the sensor attributes so UI cards can draw the affected area. This can increase entity state size.
data_description.message_types: Choose which message categories to include when Show messages is enabled.
